snippet.title: The Fertile Crescent 1.0 - Official Trailer - Bronze Age RTS
snippet.description:
After 27 months in Early Access, the Bronze Age RTS TFC: The Fertile Crescent finally exists Early Access and enters 1.0, with the Campaign, new map types, war chariots, and more!

Get it now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1674820/TFC_The_Fertile_Crescent/

Get it now on GOG: https://www.gog.com/en/game/tfc_the_fertile_crescent

Join our Discord community:
- Discord: https://discord.com/invite/9nGpUe2

Thanks to ‪@Andyax for helping us make this trailer!
